movies.title: Iron Man (2008)
movies.description: The first Marvel Cinematic Universe movie that introduces Tony Stark, a genius billionaire who becomes Iron Man.

movies.title: The Incredible Hulk (2008)
movies.description: Bruce Banner becomes the Hulk as he searches for a cure and battles the monstrous Abomination.

movies.title: Iron Man 2 (2010)
movies.description: Tony Stark faces a new adversary, Whiplash, and explores the responsibilities of being Iron Man.

movies.title: Thor (2011)
movies.description: Thor, the God of Thunder, is cast out of Asgard and must prove himself worthy to wield Mjolnir.

movies.title: Captain America: The First Avenger (2011)
movies.description: Steve Rogers transforms into Captain America and fights Hydra in World War II.

movies.title: Marvel’s The Avengers (2012)
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes, including Iron Man, Captain America, Thor, and Hulk, assemble to stop Loki's invasion.

movies.title: Iron Man 3 (2013)
movies.description: Tony Stark confronts his past and battles the elusive Mandarin.

movies.title: Thor: The Dark World (2013)
movies.description: Thor battles the Dark Elves to protect the Nine Realms and save Jane Foster.

movies.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier (2014)
movies.description: Steve Rogers battles Hydra and his old friend, now the Winter Soldier.

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy (2014)
movies.description: A group of intergalactic misfits teams up to stop a powerful villain from destroying the galaxy.

movies.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron (2015)
movies.description: The Avengers face Ultron, a rogue AI intent on world destruction.

movies.title: Ant-Man (2015)
movies.description: Scott Lang becomes the tiny but mighty hero, Ant-Man, to pull off a heist.

movies.title: Captain America: Civil War (2016)
movies.description: The Avengers are divided over the Sokovia Accords, leading to a battle between Team Iron Man and Team Captain America.

movies.title: Doctor Strange (2016)
movies.description: A brilliant but arrogant neurosurgeon learns the mystic arts after a life-changing accident.

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 (2017)
movies.description: The Guardians unravel Peter Quill's mysterious parentage while battling new threats.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
movies.description: Peter Parker balances high school life with his superhero duties as Spider-Man.

movies.title: Thor: Ragnarok (2017)
movies.description: Thor must escape the planet Sakaar to save Asgard from Hela and the impending Ragnarok.

movies.title: Black Panther (2018)
movies.description: T'Challa returns to Wakanda to claim his throne as king, but faces challenges from an enemy threatening his nation.

movies.title: Avengers: Infinity War (2018)
movies.description: The Avengers and Guardians unite to stop Thanos from collecting all six Infinity Stones.

movies.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp (2018)
movies.description: Scott Lang teams up with Hope van Dyne as the Wasp to rescue her mother from the quantum realm.

movies.title: Captain Marvel (2019)
movies.description: Carol Danvers becomes Captain Marvel as she uncovers her true identity and her role in a galactic conflict.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame (2019)
movies.description: The Avengers take one final stand against Thanos in this epic conclusion to the Infinity Saga.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Far From Home (2019)
movies.description: Peter Parker faces a new threat in Europe while grappling with the loss of Tony Stark.

movies.title: Black Widow (2021)
movies.description: Natasha Romanoff confronts her past as a spy and reunites with her family.

movies.title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings (2021)
movies.description: Shang-Chi confronts the past he thought he left behind when drawn into the web of the mysterious Ten Rings organization.

movies.title: Eternals (2021)
movies.description: The Eternals, an ancient alien race, reunite to protect Earth from their evil counterparts, the Deviants.

movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home (2021)
movies.description: Peter Parker seeks help from Doctor Strange, but their spell goes awry, unleashing villains from other dimensions.

movies.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness (2022)
movies.description: Doctor Strange traverses the multiverse to confront a powerful new adversary and protect reality itself.

movies.title: Thor: Love and Thunder (2022)
movies.description: Thor teams up with Valkyrie, Korg, and Jane Foster, now the Mighty Thor, to battle Gorr the God Butcher.

movies.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever (2022)
movies.description: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home after the death of King T’Challa.

movies.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania (2023)
movies.description: Scott Lang and Hope van Dyne navigate the Quantum Realm and face Kang the Conqueror.

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3 (2023)
movies.description: The Guardians face new challenges as they strive to protect each other and the galaxy.

movies.title: The Marvels (2023)
movies.description: Captain Marvel, Ms. Marvel, and Monica Rambeau team up to unravel an intergalactic mystery.

movies.title: Deadpool & Wolverine (2024)
movies.description: Deadpool and Wolverine join forces in an action-packed, comedic adventure across the multiverse.

movies.title: Captain America: New World Order (2025)
movies.description: Sam Wilson takes on the mantle of Captain America to face global threats and personal challenges.

movies.title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps (2025)
movies.description: Marvel’s First Family embarks on their first cinematic adventure, introducing them to the MCU.

movies.title: Avengers: Doomsday (2026)
movies.description: The Avengers unite against a new, formidable enemy threatening the fate of the multiverse.

movies.title: Avengers: Secret Wars (2027)
movies.description: The grand culmination of the Multiverse Saga as heroes from across realities unite to save existence.
